title: Senior Embedded Engineer for the Silicon validation team
summary: Join us to help deliver the next groundbreaking Apple product. Work with logic designers to understand the operation of the block and system levels. Investigate the use cases, system-level operation, and performance requirements. Develop low-level software to validate functionality, conformance, and performance of the systems. The position is relevant to Apple sites: Herzliya and Haifa.
description: In this highly visible position you will be working on best in class Apple SoC. You will be in charge of SW development for Silicon validation purposes. You will be working on design, development and integration of complex drivers, tests and SW infrastructure, as well as SoC Bring-ups and complex debug activities.
preferred_qualifications: Bachelors Degree or Master Degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering
